thread.title: Shaquille O'Neal instantly makes Corey Brewer's terrible pass a 'Shaqtin A Fool' nominee
thread.title_full: Shaquille O'Neal instantly makes Corey Brewer's terrible pass a 'Shaqtin A Fool' nominee

author: Whitney Medworth
title: Shaquille O'Neal instantly makes Corey Brewer's terrible pass a 'Shaqtin A Fool' nominee
text:
This is what happens when Shaq is calling a game.
Your chances of making it on TNT’s Shaqtin’ A Fool dramatically increase when you make a bad pass while Shaquille O’Neal is in the building. Lakers’ guard Corey Brewer had Jordan Clarkson on a wide open fast break on Monday night against the Nuggets but Brewer opted to go for flash instead of a sure basket. So instead all he got was a lousy turnover.
"You know what that's going to be on Thursday!" @SHAQ got an early look at this one #Shaqtin pic.twitter.com/gzAXsTJMMa 
— Shaqtin' a Fool (@shaqtin) March 14, 2017 O’Neal is in the building calling the games as part of TNT’s “Players Only” coverage which takes place on Monday evenings. 
Later in the same quarter Brewer had back to back dunks that were good enough for Shaq to say that Brewer was off the show on Thursday. We’ll see if that holds true.
"It takes two to make a thing go right" - @Barryathree 

Corey Brewer looks to redeem his #Shaqtin moment w/ back-to-back slams! #PlayersOnly pic.twitter.com/hR2YewQIID 
— Players Only on TNT (@NBAonTNT) March 14, 2017
